title: Red Pier
overview: Shortly after arriving in Kobe, "Jiro the Lefty", a killer with a natural talent, witnesses a man die in a crane accident which turns out to be a cover-up for a murder. Jiro soon finds himself on the run, tailed by a determined cop.

title: Wounded Beast
overview: A tense action game that skillfully intertwines the human love between a criminal, his sister and his lover, and the desperate pursuit of a detective who is trying to catch a fleeing young criminal.

title: The Gun Runners
overview: Remake of "To Have and Have Not" based on Hemingway short story. Plot reset to early days of Cuban revolution. A charter boat skipper gets entangled in gunrunning scheme to get money to pay off debts. Sort of a sea-going film noir with bad girl, smarmy villain, and the "innocent" drawn into wrong side of law by circumstances.
tagline: Hemingway-hot adventure !

title: Hell on Frisco Bay
overview: A cop framed for a murder he did not commit hunts the San Francisco waterfront for the Mob racketeers who are responsible.
tagline: Steve Rollins... his guns... his vengeance... alone on the Bay-Front!

title: Please Murder Me
overview: A lawyer tries to exact justice on a woman he defended in court -- a woman whom he found out was guilty after getting her off.
tagline: You are going to commit another murder...

title: Nightmare
overview: Clarinetist Stan has a nightmare about killing a man in a mirrored room. But when he wakes up and finds blood marks on himself and a key from the dream, he suspects that it may have truly happened.
tagline: Beware! These are the eyes of a hypnotist!

title: The Dalton Girls
overview: Female relatives of the infamous Dalton gang carry on the family tradition.
tagline: THE MADE MEN CRAWL BEFORE THEIR GUNS BY DAY...AND SNARED THEM IN THEIR LOVE TRAPS AT NIGHT!

title: Damn Citizen
overview: Louisiana's governor asks war hero Francis C. Grevemberg (Keith Andes) to lead the state police against corruption.
tagline: He smashed the rottenest vice-machine in the U.S.!

title: The Rambling Guitarist
overview: Arriving in the town of Hakodate, a wandering musician, Shinji Taki, is soon recruited by the local gang as a hired hand. However, with the arrival of a sinister gunman, Taki's mysterious past catches up with him.

title: Doctor Crippen Lives
overview: Double murderer Dr. Crippen is using every means possible to search for a manuscript that he suspects is in the possession of the daughter of the man who was executed in his place.

title: The Great Van Robbery
overview: Interpol detective Caesar Smith tracks robbers of the Royal Mint van. He travels to Rio de Janeiro, Rome and Paris and establishes the guilt of a London coffee importer.

title: Crashout
overview: Convict Van Duff engineers a large-scale prison break; the six survivors hide out in a forgotten mine working near the prison, then set out on a long, dangerous journey by foot, car, train and truck to retrieve Duff's bank loot. En route, as they touch the lives of "regular folks," each has his own rendezvous with destiny.
tagline: The desperate cry of caged men who go over the wall!

title: Fellowship of the Frog
overview: Both Scotland Yard and an amateur American sleuth are tracking a master criminal known as The Frog. This moniker refers to the bulging-eyed mask worn by the evildoer, and is reflected by the frog icons painfully tatooed onto the forearms of his henchmen. The trail leads to the country manor of an enigmatic, steely-eyed nabob, whose repressed son has eyes for the artistes at the Lolita cabaret, and whose lovely daughter captures the fancy of both the American playboy and the villain himself. Murder, kidnapping and seduction ensue.

title: The Purple Hood
overview: Kataoka Chiezo stars as Murasaki Zukin, a mysterious hero of the people who helps those in need. Now under the rule of the evil Tanuma, the people look to Murasaki Zukin more than ever, to confront and punish those who bring misfortune upon the commoners. Will he be able to bring peace to the land? One of the greatest actors from Toei Studios, known mainly for his swashbuckling roles as powerful swordsmen such as Ryunosuke in SOULS IN THE MOONLIGHT, he appeared in 325 films both before and after the war, beginning with CHUSHINGURA in 1928, and including KUNISADA CHUJI in 1933, and DOKUGANRYO MASAMUNE. While best known for his swordplay, Chiezo really did not enjoy the action, but was able to use his menacing presence to stare down his adversaries. Although Kataoka Chiezo passed away in 1983 at the age of 79, he still has many fans today. This film shows him at his best.

title: Age of Nudity
overview: The story deals with a juvenile delinquent gang surviving through petty thievery. However, everything gets screwed up when they accidentally steal big bucks from the Yakuza.

title: The Tijuana Story
overview: Courageous newspaper editor Manuel Acosta Mesa tries to take on the mob in Tijuana through his newspaper, reporting on the violence, prostitution and drug sales in the border town.
tagline: Here's why they call Tijuana America's bargain basement of sin!

title: Mukeisatsu
overview: Japanese crime film.

title: Tread Softly Stranger
overview: Unable to pay his bookie, a man returns to his hometown where his embezzler brother and girlfriend plot a robbery that ends in tragedy.
tagline: A Stark Drama Filmed Against the Turbulent FIERY Background of Steel

title: Cell 2455 Death Row
overview: A Death Row inmate uses his prison law studies to fight for his life. Based on a true story.
tagline: THE BEST-SELLER ACTUALLY WRITTEN IN THE DEATH CELL!

title: Rock All Night
overview: Cloud Nine, the local teen hangout, has been taken over by a pair of escaped killers, who hold the local teens hostage. The bartender realizes it's up to him to save the kids.
tagline: Some Have to Dance... Some Have to Kill!

title: The Shadow of Fear
overview: In the backstreets of Ginza, the boss of a hairdressing salon is found dead, killed by strangulation. The detective on the case soon hears rumors about the murder.

title: Confessions of Felix Krull
overview: Thomas Mann's witty and intimate story of a irresistible scoundrel.

title: The Burglar
overview: Burglar Nat Harbin and his two associates set their sights on wealthy spiritualist Sister Sarah, who has inherited a fortune -- including a renowned emerald necklace -- from a Philadelphia financier. Using Nat's female ward, Gladden, to pose as an admirer and case the mansion where the woman lives, they set up a perfect break-in. Things get complicated afterwards.
tagline: A trail of perfume... and violence!

title: Paksunahka
overview: A man dreaming of becoming a private detective gets suck into an investigation of a crime involving the theft of a secret chemical formula.

title: The Scarlet Hour
overview: An unhappy wife uses her powers of manipulation to draw an infatuated man into an ill-fated jewelry heist.
tagline: Another Dramatic Hit From Academy Award Director Michal Curtiz !

title: Dino
overview: A juvenile delinquent on parole receives support from a social worker and a girl from a slum.
tagline: First love... First thrills... First mistakes!

title: A Cry in the Night
overview: A police captain's emotions get in the way when his daughter is kidnapped.
tagline: THE TEEN-AGE DATE IN LOVERS' LANE THEY'LL NEVER LET HER FORGET!

title: Tiger by the Tail
overview: On the first night of his London assignment, newsagency reporter John Desmonmd becomes heavily involved with enigmatic Anna Ray. The affair ends when she is shot struggling for a gun she has pulled on him. This is only the start of his troubles, as Anna worked for a criminal organisation who know Desmond has now got her valuable contacts list.
tagline: The Walls of a Whole City Were Closing In...And Now He Was Running For His Life!

title: Wolves of the Night
overview: A unique action drama in which a ruthless yakuza encounters a woman and realizes his true love as the conflict between the yakuza intensifies.

title: Burning Fuse
overview: Lola, the wife of arms dealer Pedro Wassewich, is attracted to Ludovic, a young painter who turns out to be the emissary of a notorious gangster. He claims to have been sent by the latter to pick up a shipment. In fact, it's the police who, behind the scenes, orchestrate the operation to catch Wassewich red-handed.

title: Case of the Hidden Coin
overview: A mysterious coin found at a murder scene stirs the curiosity of young actress detective Oshichi and her brother Hyoma, who set out on a private investigation to unveil the secrets hidden behind the coin.

title: Gangster Boss
overview: In Paris, two scoundrels kidnap a wealthy man's preteen son, disguised as Indians, only to find he's a savvy detective, making their ransom plan much more complicated.

title: Sinners of Paris
overview: Michel Piccoli plays a police inspector whose best friend is murdered on the orders of gang boss Charles Vanel. The inspector knows full well that Vanel is too crafty and well-connected to ever stand trial for his crime, so he carefully lays a subtle trap for his adversary. Unfortunately, both Piccoli and Vanel are thwarted by a pair of scheming females.

title: Revolt in the Big House
overview: A crime boss tries to cause a riot and prison break while behind bars.
tagline: The Biggest, Toughest Thriller Of Them All! A raw, violent world of caged men unleashed! Killers and lifers blasting over the big wall!

title: Female on the Beach
overview: Lynn Markham moves into her late husband's beach house the morning after former tenant Eloise Crandall fell from the cliff. To her annoyance, Lynn finds both her real estate agent and Drummond Hall, her beachcomber neighbor, making themselves quite at home. Lynn soon has no doubts of what her scheming neighbors are up to, but she finds Drummond's physical charms hard to resist. And she still doesn't know what really happened to Eloise.
tagline: She was TOO HUNGRY FOR LOVE... to care where she found it!

title: Sudden Danger
overview: Detective Andy Doyle suspects that a suicide is actually a murder. He suspects the victim's son, Wallace who is blind and he pursues him until he gets to the truth.
tagline: WHEN CRIMSON LIPS SPELL SUDDEN DANGER

title: The Knife to the Throat
overview: Pacos Le Maltais, leader of a gang, lays down the law on the quay of Marseille. He fires one of his henchmen, Le Chinois, who killed a woman during the last bank stickup.

title: Street Is Full of Surprises
overview: Chief accountant Porfiry Petrovich Smirnov-Alyansky, who took a good walk on the anniversary of his colleague cashier Ivan Zakharovich Vodnev, climbs into the traffic controller's booth and disrupts traffic on one of the streets of Leningrad. However, the guard Vasiliy Shaneshkin mistakenly delivers to the police station not an escaped offender, but a quite decent cashier. In addition, Vodnev, offended by the police, turns out to be the father of the bride Shaneshkin — Katya. Vasiliy admits his guilt, but, not daring to explain himself, leaves the angry Ivan Zakharovich with bad thoughts about the Soviet police. Fortunately, the young sergeant will soon have an opportunity to prove to others the responsibility and conscientiousness of the police officers.

title: Andalusia Express
overview: Three men plan a jewelry heist abroad the Andalusia express train.

title: Secret White Line Zone
overview: First film in Teruo Ishii's Line series.

title: Over-Exposed
overview: This titillating bit of pulp sensationalism was the last in a string of "B" films that Cleo Moore starred in at Columbia. Moore plays Lila Crane, an ambitious clip-joint floozie turned photographer with flexible morals and a penchant for fast money.
tagline: C-girl--curves and a camera!

title: Assignment Redhead
overview: An American army officer working for British intelligence comes to post-war Berlin to solve a murder. His investigation is compromised when he falls for a nightclub singer, not realising she is an agent of the criminal mastermind he is on the trail of.

title: Cry Tough
overview: After getting out of prison, a Latino criminal tries to go straight.
tagline: Sudden Violence Rips Into the Heart and Guts of a City!

title: High School Big Shot
overview: Marv needs money. His unemployed dad is so poor that he makes Marv give up half his last six bucks so they can both go on three-dollar dates; he's just lost his scholarship after getting caught writing a term paper for Betty, the prettiest (and only) girl in his class; and Betty herself has told him he doesn't stand a chance with her unless he can give her what she wants most: money, money, money. But Marv has mob ties and Marv knows where to find a million dollars cash.
tagline: The kid who showed the big time how!

title: Passport to Shame
overview: British melodrama about a cabbie befriending a girl caught up in the white slave trade.
tagline: A PICTURE BEST UNDERSTOOD BY ADULTS!

title: The Steel Jungle
overview: The tale of a young bookie, married to a beautiful woman who goes to jail, and becomes involved with hoodlums.
tagline: Gang rule behind bars!

title: Dream Young Man's Dream
overview: An early contemporary yakuza action drama.

title: Three O'clock in the Morning in a Big City
overview: To avenge the death of his brother, a student shooting champion infiltrates the criminal world.  An entertaining action drama and an interesting love story.

title: The Lowest Man
overview: A young offender who is already guilty of many crimes is sentenced again for rape. Upon his release from prison, a year later, the victim waits to kill him.

title: The Fugitive
overview: An action drama similar to Wyler's "The Desperate Hours", adapted by Seiji Hoshikawa of "Tasogare no Tokyo Tower" based on Shinji Fujiwara's original work.  Jiro, who had been unable to rehabilitate because of the stigma of having criminal record, stopped by at his favorite bar. There, Shimamoto was waiting for him, and Jiro was offered a job to carry certain things. Jiro was attracted by the large amount of reward and finally accepted the task. The car driven by Jiro was investigated by a police officer on the way, but Shimamoto shooted the police officer and orders to help Jiro escape at full speed...

title: The Secret Place
overview: British Melodrama and crime thriller that follows a group of jewel robbers after a major heist. The film makes extensive use of bombed out areas of London.

title: The Weapon
overview: A boy accidentally shoots a friend with a gun he found in the rubble of a destroyed building. The gun turns out to be a clue in a ten-year-old murder case.
tagline: This Gun Talked...

title: The Counterfeit Plan
overview: An escaped murderer flees France to England, where he forces an ex-forger, now established as a reputable estate owner, and the forger's daughter who knew nothing of his past, to counterfeit 5-pound notes for mass distribution around the countryside.
tagline: The Whole Savage Story of the $100,000,000 Counterfeit Ring!

title: Interpol
overview: Spurred on by the death of his drug-addicted sister at the hands of ruthless narcotics kingpin Frank McNally, U.S. drug enforcement agent Charles Sturgis embarks on an investigation that takes him from New York to London, Lisbon, Rome, Naples and finally Athens in pursuit of McNally's shapely associate, Gina Broger.
tagline: This Is A Picture About DOPE!

title: Police Precinct: The Pickpocket Killer
overview: After discovering a slaughtered corpse, the investigating team of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department began canvassing the area around the crime scene. As a result, they found a wallet with bloodstains that seemed to belong to the victim, a woman's wallet that did not fit the field, earrings, and other valuable materials, which led them on a foot search. The woman's purse had been picked up by a male prostitute on the subway, and from the prostitute's testimony, they were able to identify the pickpocket's face, but the next day, the man was found dead in a road accident, apparently murdered.

title: Crazy in the Noodle
overview: Pierre Cousin, a depressive compositor, wants to die. After five vain attempts at committing suicide, he decides to hire professional hit men to do the job on him. But as he's waiting for death, he accidentally saves a suicidal young woman's life... and falls in love. Having suddenly found a reason to live, he now fears the killers he himself hired. Is there still time to call off his contract?

title: The Man Who Died Twice
overview: An innocent nightclub singer becomes mixed up in illegal drug dealings shortly after witnessing her husband's death and the murder of a couple of narcotics agents.
tagline: REIGN-OF-TERROR...BY KILLERS AND VICE KINGS OF THE UNDERWORLD!

title: Portland Exposé
overview: The owner of a tavern is pressured by the local mob to go into business with them, and figures it's better all around if he does that rather than cause trouble. However, when he starts to see what kind of place his nice little neighborhood bar is turning into, and when one of the mob's goons tries to rape his daughter, he decides to fight them.
tagline: THE PICTURE THEY TRIED TO STOP! Hotter than "Phenix City"!

title: Nowhere to Go
overview: A professional thief is sprung from prison with the assistance of a new partner who wants to know where he's hid his loot.
tagline: ...except into a woman's arms!

title: Across the Bridge
overview: In Mexico, a financier on the run poses as a man he just murdered, only to find out that the man was also a murderer.
tagline: In the Tradition of the Finest British Chiller Thrillers

title: Brutal battle
overview: The president of the Hong Kong Almond Cola company, Liu's grandfather, signed a purchase and sale agreement with Showa Nakajima from Japan, and shortly before leaving for Japan, someone attacked him. Before he died, before he lost consciousness, he transferred all the rights to the company to his close confidant Murota and told him to transfer them to his daughter, whom he left in Japan 20 years ago. Murota, who inherited Liu's will, went to Japan. However, the gang of James Howe, the head of the Hong Kong trading world, was waiting for him, seeking to obtain the rights to Almond Cola…

title: The Bloody Brood
overview: Nico, a drug dealer, murders a telegram messenger-boy "for kicks", egged on by partner-in-crime, TV director Francis. Cliff, the boy's older brother, investigates his death due to the slow progress made by the police.
tagline: Your shocked eyes will see it... your stunned mind won't believe it... Never before... has vice and violence struck with such frightening force!

title: Lisbon
overview: For Capt. Robert John Evans, smuggling black-market goods is nothing out of the ordinary. But one day he's hired by Aristides Mavros for a more involved assignment -- sneaking an imprisoned American out of communist-controlled territory. The job seems challenging enough, but when he meets the prisoner's sultry wife, Sylvia, he realizes his mission comes with a startling catch: Not only must he rescue this man, he must bring him back from the dead.
tagline: City of intrigue, murder and excitement!

title: House of Secrets
overview: Police in Paris recruit an English ship's officer (Michael Craig) to help trap counterfeiters by joining them.

title: Edge of Eternity
overview: Helped by socialite Janice Kendon and barkeeper Scott O'Brien, Arizona deputy sheriff Les Martin works to solve three brutal murders in and around the Grand Canyon. His efforts leads to the killer fleeing with Janice as a hostage and a chase by car and helicopter lead to a climax on a miner's bucket on cables a mile above the canyon floor.
tagline: Mile-High Suspense In The Grand Canyon!

title: The Case of Poisons
overview: Madame de Montespan, the Maîtresse-en-titre of Louis XIV, has been in disgrace since the King set eyes on a younger beauty, Marie-Angélique Scorailles. Having had enough of the situation, the rejected mistress decides to visit La Voisin, a woman known as a fortune teller, a doctor, a midwife and who is also said to arrange black masses and sell poisons. Some time later Marie-Angélique, now Duchess of Fontanges, dies mysteriously aged only twenty...

title: Accomplice
overview: Based on the short story of the same name by Seichō Matsumoto.

title: Escape from San Quentin
overview: Desmond plays convict Mike Gilbert, who goes on the lam with fellow prisoners Gruber and Graham when he finds out his wife is divorcing him and feels he has nothing to lose. Gruber intends to get his robbery loot, which his father, Curly, has successfully hidden from the law.  After commandeering a plane, they double-cross Graham, who assembles his gang to get revenge - and Gruber's loot. Meanwhile, Gilbert falls in love with Robbie, his ex-wife’s sister. Through Robbie’s influence, Gilbert decides to go straight, but his cohorts aren’t quite so willing to reform.
tagline: The Inside Story Behind the Most Amazing Crash-Out in Crime Annals!

title: The True Story of Lynn Stuart
overview: When the nephews of Phyllis Carter are killed in an automobile crash while under the influence of narcotics, she persuades Police Lieutenant Jim Hahan to use her as an undercover agent.
tagline: "I DON'T DARE SHOW MY FACE!"

title: High School Confidential!
overview: A tough kid comes to a new high school and begins muscling his way into the drug scene. This is a typical morality play of the era, filled with a naive view of drugs, nihilistic beat poetry, and some incredible '50s slang.
tagline: Behind these "nice" school walls... A TEACHERS' NIGHTMARE!...A TEEN-AGE JUNGLE!

title: Roar of the City
overview: This action drama depicts a horrifying murder case over a photo of a mysterious beautiful woman hidden in a wallet, and the justice and love-hate relationship between the men involved in the case.

title: Le Crâneur
overview: A singer tries to rescue a man drawn into the drug trade.

title: They Can't Hang Me
overview: A murderer hopes to escape his death sentence by identifying the leaders of a spy ring.
tagline: A thrill-a-minute story behind today's atomic headlines!

title: The Boss
overview: A crusading politician falls prey to the temptations of power.
tagline: Uncensored and uncut version of a scandalous true story!

title: Teenage Doll
overview: The Black Widows, a teenage girl gang, find one of their number killed; they suspect Barbara, sometime girlfriend of the leader of rival gang The Vandals. As the gangs prepare for a rumble, we glimpse the members' home lives, exaggerating every type of family dysfunction; but that of their "average American" quarry is no better. Full of shadowy urban night scenes.
tagline: tempted... tarnished... violently thrown aside!

title: Soultan
overview: The story revolves around Sultan, the poor child who grows up and becomes a military correspondent at an elite brigade. He enjoys the sympathy of the police officer, the son of the general, unlike the rest of the house.

title: Contraband Spain
overview: An FBI agent goes to the French-Spanish border to round up some smugglers and counterfeiters after his brother is murdered.

title: Fortune Is a Woman
overview: An insurance man discovers his ex-girlfriend and her husband's art-forgery/arson scam.
tagline: They Can't Kiss Away Their Conscience

title: OSS 117 Is Not Dead
overview: OSS 117 is asked for help by a female acquaintance Muriel Rousset. She beseeches him to retrieve secret documents which have been stolen from Sir Anthony Lead, the father of Anita and Marion. He complies with her wish and no obstacle or danger can hinder him from meeting her expectations.

title: The Glass Cage
overview: A circus barker stages a sensational new act, the world's longest fast undertaken by “Sapolio”, on view in a glass cage. But this act also results in several murders, a kidnapping, and a poisoning!
tagline: JAGGED EDGE OF VIOLENCE!...THAT SHATTERS THE SCREEN WITH SUSPENSE!

title: Shimizu Port of Chivalry
overview: An all-star cast highlights this Jidai-Geki classic. Set in the samurai era, this is the tale of period Yakuza. One of the real classics in this genre. In this dramatic portrayal of the real-life gambling boss Jirocho, a good-hearted and honest boss sets out to take revenge for a fellow boss.  At the same time, the other local bosses, in a bid to increase their own power, plot to dispose of Jirocho. Starring Kataoka Chiezo in one of his signature roles, this is an excellent portrayal of a figure who is not well known outside of Japan. Co-starring Nakamura Kinnosuke, this exciting tale of period yakuza brings history to life.

title: A Kiss for a Killer
overview: In Nice, a wealthy widow is charmed by a young man who marries her and manages her finances. He soon starts an affair with her secretary, who proves to be even more ruthless than he is.

title: Running Wild
overview: To get evidence against a crooked garage owner, a rookie cop masquerades as a hard case who wants a job as a mechanic.
tagline: The Stark Brutal Truth About Today's Lost Generation!

title: Nude Actress Murder Case: Five Criminals
overview: Japanese mystery film.

title: House of Numbers
overview: Story of twin brothers - one trying to help another escape from prison.
tagline: Actually filmed in SAN QUENTIN

title: The Case Against Brooklyn
overview: A rookie cop takes on criminals who have the local government in their pocket.
tagline: Is this cop for sale?

title: Case No. 306
overview: While investigating a regular traffic accidents detectives find evidence of foreign intelligence involvement.

title: Storm Fear
overview: A wounded bank robber takes over his brother's home.
tagline: ... tonight her terror would begin!

title: Sentence
overview: Engineer Japaridze, in order to speed up the construction of the hydroelectric station, grossly violates the safety rules and causes a disaster. He is sentenced to a long prison term.

title: The Days of Evil Women
overview: The common-law wife and daughter of a wealthy old man plot to murder him and steal his fortune, with the help of their male acquaintances.

title: The Man Who Wouldn't Talk
overview: American scientist Dr. Frank Smith is brought to Britain to help the C.I.A. There is a defecting East block scientist they want him to debrief. The commies are less than amused and set Dr. Smith up for a murder.
